distri: First of all it is interesting to observe that RnB is a standalone genre of music. By standalone, we mean the fact that very few RnB songs are also classified as another type of music. Intriguingly however, except for the instrumentalness, RnB music seems to represent quite well the average song. This last sentence must be taken with care has the cause of that is also that the instrumentalness is the feature which is the most variable between genres compared to any other feature.
